channel.title: Can anyone portforward with my router?
channel.description:
Hello people, I really need help to portforward my server it's 317. But nobody knows how to portforward with my router. My router is: Bt homehub.
You can contact me by msn: sexy_robert_manu@hotmail.co.uk Or by this.
THANK YOU!

item.title: Can anyone portforward with my router?
item.dc:creator: @run3scap3_uk run3scap3_uk
item.description:
@run3scap3_uk wrote:

Still won’t work guys. Please help me !! I’ve always wanted my own server so players can play on it.

Read full topic
